property.name: insertPathwayQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.pathway ( pathway_id, bio_data_item_id, pathway_desc ) VALUES ( :PATHWAY_ID, :BIO_DATA_ITEM_ID, :PATHWAY_DESC )

property.name: loadPathwayQuery
property.value:
SELECT b.bio_data_item_id, b.name, b.type, b.path, b.source, b.format, b.created_date, b.bucket_id, b.pretty_name, b.owner,
t.pathway_id, t.pathway_desc FROM catgenome.pathway t join catgenome.biological_data_item b ON t.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id WHERE pathway_id = ?

property.name: loadPathwaysQuery
property.value:
